entry.title: Road Snowfall Warning
entry.summary: Snow is expected to affect the road from Saturday afternoon to early Sunday morning, mainly between Hanmer and Lewis Pass. 2 to 4 cm may accumulate above 600 metres, with lesser amounts lower down.

entry.title: Road Snowfall Warning
entry.summary: Snow is expected to affect the road this afternoon and evening. 2 to 5 cm may accumulate on the road above 600 metres, with lesser amounts down to 400 metres.
